original_title: Graham Norton: Live at the Roundhouse
overview: Graham Norton, media darling and presenter of the outrageous 'So... Graham Norton' show makes his first live performance video, shot at London's The Roundhouse. Norton whose irresistible and naughty persona is a lot more so as a live performer calls on his background as a stand-up comedian, but also includes elements like the soft-toy telephone from his television show.
title: Graham Norton: Live at the Roundhouse
